abstract: SMJ is committed to publishing high-quality replications on a regular basis. SMJ's overriding goal in publishing replications is to provide additional evidence that helps to build a cumulative body of knowledge in strategic management, not to overturn prior results. SMJ is interested in replications that accord with prior findings as well as those that do not. Copyright Â© 2016 John Wiley & Sons, Ltd. [ABSTRACT FROM AUTHOR]
